Minor Bug Fixes

Minor Bug Fixes

Optimised for iOS 10
Minor Bug Fixes

Optimised for iOS 10
Minor Bug Fixes

Major Update
---------------
- Complete rewrite of the morphing engine
- Added new editing modes
- Added zooming support
- Added a brand new tutorial
- Can now undo previous changes
- New preview Modes

Major Update
---------------

- Added new editing modes
- Added zooming support

Minor Bug Fixes
Minor Bug Fixes

Minor Fixes
- Made the tutorial shorter
- Renamed controls/labels to make it clearer
- Minor tweak on the morph algorithms

- Made the tutorial shorter

A few tweaks and improvements.

Brand New Face Editor
Brand New Skin Editor

Brand New Face Editor
Brand New Skin Editor

Improvements to New Face Editing Features

Minor Changes to user interface

Improvements to New Face Editing Features

Minor Changes to user interface

Upgraded to support iOS 12
Tweaked the Body Enhancing tools suite
Fixed an issue where app would crash sometimes on editor screen

Added Video Tutorials to help teach how best to use the app
Added a 'Simple' mode to the blemish remover tool to make it even easier.

Upgraded to support iOS 12
Tweaked the Body Enhancing tools suite
Fixed an issue where app would crash sometimes on editor screen

Added Video Tutorials to help teach how best to use the app
Added a 'Simple' mode to the blemish remover tool to make it even easier.

New Tool added
==========
Brand new "Blemish Remover" Tool has been added. Simply target blemishes on your skin and watch them disappear to give you a flawless look.

Brand new Feature Added!!!
=====================
Height adjuster has been added so that you can easily lengthen your legs.
This tool can also be used to make minor adjustments to the width of the photo too.

Major Update
=========
- Added New "Skin Color" Feature
- Add a quick tan to your body
- Lighten or darken your skin tone
- Remove shadows from photos
- Apply multiple skin tone colors to same photo to create the perfect effect
